org.dolan.datastructures

Class ThreadBlock

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dolan.datastructures.ThreadBlock
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IThreadBlock

    public class ThreadBlock
extends java.lang.Object
implements IThreadBlock
    The Class ThreadBlock. An implementation of IThreadBlock It represents a logical grouping of lines which is ran on the same thread. Used in the analysis and filtering algorithm.
